name: phyozawtun/myanmarfaker
description: Faker is a PHP library that generates fake data for you.

suggest.ext-curl: Required by Faker\Provider\Image to download images.
suggest.ext-dom: Required by Faker\Provider\HtmlLorem for generating random HTML.
suggest.ext-iconv: Required by Faker\Provider\ru_RU\Text::realText() for generating real Russian text.
suggest.ext-mbstring: Required for multibyte Unicode string functionality.
